attributes.action: MAKE IT ILLEGAL FOR NEWPAPERS TO PUBLISH ONE-SIDED STORIES
attributes.additional_details:
ALL NEWSPAPERS HAVE SOME SORT OF BIAS. THEREFORE THE ONLY WAY TO GET AROUND THIS INJUSTICE AND INTRODUCE FAIRNESS IS TO MAKE IT NECESSARY FOR BOTH  THE NEWSPAPER AND THEIR JOURNALISTS TO HAVE TO SEEK OUT THE CONTRARY VIEWPOINT AND  PUBLISH THAT AS WELL !
ONCE MUD HAS BEEN THROWN ITS VERY DIFFICULT TO STOP IT STICKING.Therefore WE  MUST DEMAND FAIR PLAY AND SEE THAT ALL VIEWS ARE TO BE AIRED BY ALL NEWSPAPERS OTHERWISE THEY ARE AUTOMATICALLY BIASED AND SOURCES  ONLY OF BIASED PROPAGANDA !

rejection.details: There are currently laws against libel and means of redress.
